title: Maousama No Pero Pero Keikaku
alternative_title: Mao-sama no Pero Pero Keikaku ; The Devil's Pero Pero Plan. ; 魔王さまのペロペロ計画

Description :
        2000 years after his defeat, the Devil King gets revived by his minions… in the form of a little girl!
